Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing the New York state taxi medallion guaranty program act
Summary: Establishes the New York state taxi medallion guaranty program act to assist taxi medallion owners who are otherwise unable to obtain financing, refinancing, or restructuring of an existing loan.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the urban development corporation act, in relation to establishing the New York state taxi medallion guaranty program act
